message:
Urgently Required for Multinational Corporate located in Egypt
Senior, junior, fresh positions 

Job ID #0056 UX Developer
Job Description
The UX Developer will develop applications user experience which gives the app the value of fancy interaction.
Location: Cairo, Egypt.
Responsibilities:
• implement UI experience according to Design guidelines
• Contact with designers to give apps powerful design and transition 
Required Skills & Experience 
• Bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related field.
• XAML Design 
• MS Expression Blend
• HTML 5 is Plus
• CSS 3 Is plus
Professional experience from 0 to 5 years position and salary will be determined upon experience.

Job ID #0057 UI Designer
Job Description
The UI Designer will design applications user experience which gives the development value of fancy interaction.
Location: Cairo, Egypt.
Responsibilities:
• Design fancy UI experience according to clients requirement
• Contact with developers to give apps powerful design and development 
Required Skills & Experience 
• Bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related field.
• Adobe Photoshop
• Adobe Illustrator
• Animation Design is plus
• Ability to learn new UI guidelines 
Professional experience from 0 to 5 years position and salary will be determined upon experience.

Job ID #0058 UI Finalizer
Job Description
The UI Finalizer will make design guidelines for UX developer upon UI design.
Location: Cairo, Egypt.
Responsibilities:
• Finalize the UI design
• Contact with developers and designers to give the design implementation ability 
Required Skills & Experience 
• Bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related field.
• Adobe Photoshop
• Adobe Illustrator
• Animation Design is plus
• Ability to learn new UI guidelines 
Professional experience from 0 to 5 years position and salary will be determined upon experience.

Job ID # 0044 Windows Application Developer 
Job Description
The Windows Application Developer will Develop and deploy desktop applications that adds more interaction with data provided by clients which will result in improved business performance.
Location: Cairo, Egypt.
Responsibilities:
• Implementing desktop Applications According to clients requirement
• Work in team environment 
Required Skills & Experience 
• Bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related field.
• Significant, hands-on experience in solution design, architectural analysis within portable clients systems or similer.
• Proficient in Core C#/.NET fundamentals especially Collections, events and delegates, Multi-threading and Generics.
• Proficient understanding of new language features like LINQ and lambda expressions.
• Good knowledge of OOAD, UML, Design Patterns and Data Structures.
• Experience in WPF and WCF 
• Using design patterns MVC, MVP and MVVM and RIA data/web service is plus 
• Excellent problem-solving skills.
• Ability to influence and negotiate with clients and team members
• Microsoft certificate is plus
Professional experience from 0 to 5 years position and salary will be determined upon experience.

Job ID # 0046 Windows Phone Developer

The Windows Phone developer will Develop and deploy high quality Windows phone Apps that help users to easy access and interact with data provided by companies which will result in improved business performance.
Location: Cairo, Egypt.
Responsibilities:
• Implementing Windows Phone 8/7.x Apps According to clients requirement
• Contact with designers to give apps powerful design and development 
Required Skills & Experince 
• Bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related field.
• Significant, hands-on experience in solution design, architectural analysis within portable clients systems or similer.
• Proficient in Core C#/.NET fundamentals especially Collections, events and delegates, Multi-threading and Generics.
• Proficient understanding of new language features like LINQ and lambda expressions.
• experience in at least one IOC Container and Mock Framework, NAnt and NUnit is plus.
• Good knowledge of OOAD, UML, Design Patterns and Data Structures.
• Experience in WPF and/or Silverlight with WCF .
• Using design patterns MVC, MVP and MVVM and RIA data/web service is plus 
• Excellent problem-solving skills.
• Ability to influence and negotiate with clients and team members.

Job ID # 0047 Windows 8 Store Apps Developer
Job Description
The Windows 8 Store Apps Developer will Develop and deploy high quality Modern- UI Apps that help users to easy access and interact with data provided by companies which will result in improved business performance.
Location: Cairo, Egypt.

Required Skills & Experince

Job ID # 0048 Kinect Developer
Job Description
The Kinect Developer will Develop and deploy high value Kinect Apps that help users to easy access and interact with technologies using motions and voice orders.
Location: Cairo, Egypt.
Responsibilities:
• Implementing Kinect Apps According to clients requirement
• Contact with designers to give apps powerful design and development 
Required Skills & Experince

• Significant, hands-on experience in solution design, architectural analysis Image processing systems or similar.
• Proficient in Core C#/.NET fundamentals especially Collections, events and delegates, Multi-threading and Generics.

• Experience in WPF and/or Silverlight with WCF using MVC, MVP and MVVM and RIA data/web services and familiarity with UI/UE design and implementation.
• Excellent problem-solving skills.
• Ability to influence and negotiate with clients and team members.

Job ID #0022 BI Developer
Job Description
The Business Intelligence Reporting Developer will partner with key business leaders and analytics within the organization to design and deploy enterprise-wide Business Intelligence (BI) solutions that empower various business teams with actionable information which will result in improved business performance.
Location: Cairo, Egypt.

Responsibilities:
• Applying data warehouse (DW) and business intelligence expertise to incorporate actionable business information.
• Help with the design of a robust reporting solution using Microsoft suite of products including the use of SharePoint (along with Power Pivot, Power View, etc.) to deliver data and provide business users with ad hoc reporting capabilities.
• Help develop BI expertise within the business.
• Promote the adoption of BI analytical solutions, concepts and tools.
• Work with end users and business analysts to ensure tight fit between the BI environment and business requirement.
• Prototype BI solutions to validate requirements and data quality profiles.
• Assist business in defining performance management processes to capture BI return on investment.
• BI solution development and deployment.
• Create role-based KPI’s, scorecards, dashboards and reports.
• Manage secured user access to BI content.
• Customize BI tools to meet business requirements.
• Develop multidimensional and SQL data warehouse semantic.
• Design and create data integration solutions in support of data warehouse and cube build process.
• Help business users select and apply appropriate BI tool(s).
• Investigate new technologies and research ongoing industry developments.
• Complies with all guidelines established by the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid (CMS) and guidelines set forth by other regulatory agencies, where applicable, and defined in the Universal American Corporate and department policies.
• And all other duties assigned by the manager and/or supervisor.
Required Skills
• Professional verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to clearly articulate thoughts and ideas
• Organizational skills with the ability to handle multiple tasks and/or projects at one time
• Customer service skills with the ability to interact professionally and effectively with providers, third party payers, physicians, and staff from all departments within and outside the Company
• Analytical and interpretation skills including departmental, utilization, financial and operations data
• Decision-making skills with the ability to investigate and weigh alternatives and select the course of action that provides the greatest benefit to the organization
• Creative thinking skills with the ability to ask the needed bigger-picture questions that lead to process and team improvements
• Time management skills with the ability to prioritize and schedule daily activities for the most efficient use of time
• Problem solving skills with the ability to look for root causes and implementable, workable solutions
• Interpersonal skills with the ability to work in a fast-paced environment and participate as an independent contributor with little supervision or as an active team member depending on the situation and needs
• Must have a track record of producing work that is highly accurate, demonstrates attention to detail, and reflects well on the organization
Required Experience
• Bachelor’s degree
• Experience with Microsoft Business Intelligence Stack
• Experience with Performance Point Services (PPS)
• Experience with Excel Services, Pivot Tables and Power Pivot
• Experience with Integration Services (SSIS)
• Experience with Reporting Services (SSAS)
• Experience with Analysis Services (SSAS)
• Experience with SharePoint 2010
• Experience with Visual Studio 2008-2012 Multi-dimensional, Columnar and SQL Data Structures
• Insurance background a plus
• Personal computer experience should include working with Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint and Outlook at the intermediate level at a minimum

Job ID # 0013 QA Tester
Job Description
the Software QA Tester will work with a variety of groups including analysts, developers, and technical writers. The primary focus of the Software QA Tester will be to develop, implement, and document all testing activities, including test planning, test documentation, test execution, defect tracking and reporting, including follow-up and issue resolution. The Software QA Tester will also participate in the continuous development of the QA Team’s standard practices and procedures.
Location: Cairo, Egypt.
Responsibilities:
• Participate in planning all testing activities accordingly to ensure deliverables are met on time; including test planning, test execution, defect tracking, and reporting.
• Plan, design, evaluate, and execute test cases and test plans for Functional, Performance, Stress, and Regression testing.
• Implement tests based on systems understanding and analysis of functional and systems specifications.
• Effectively and accurately document and analyze all test results to accurately assess product quality and proactively work to resolve any issues.
• Establish and maintain test data.
• Document and present detailed and summary test findings throughout the life of the project.
• Communicate effectively to ensure that all testing needs are being assessed and addressed to ensure products meet or exceed client expectations.
• Maintain baseline test metrics for each application, component, and release.
• Continue to develop technical expertise related to testing of Enterprise applications.
• Effectively balance work on multiple projects and teams simultaneously
Required Skills & Experince 
• Considerable hands-on experience executing both manual & automated testing.
• Experience writing test documentation such as Test Plans, scripts and test results reports.
• Must be able to multi-task and excel in a fast-paced, on-time deliverable environment.
• Strong analytical skill and mindset, with research, problem solving, and troubleshooting abilities.
• Ability to analyze/interpret test results and provide recommendations to improve testing.
• Very strong organization, multi-tasking, communication, time management, and documentation skills.
IF you interested please send your updated CV to nuijobs@yahoo.com including job Title, ID and Position .
